creditline: Gift of Janis Conner and Joel Rosenkranz, N.Y.
description: sketches for six sculptures, from L: soldier carrying a man, winged male figure, knight, winged figure with birds, figure with foliage and lines streaming from upstretched hands, figure looking down on small floating figures; separately matted legend (b): \"PROPOSED- SCALE 1/2\" = 1\'/ SCULPTURE DESIGNED AND DEL. BY / LEO FRIEDLANDER, SC. MAY 1949\"
marks: Signature and Date LRC, in pencil: [LEO FRIEDLANDER, SC. / DES. & DEL
title: Heroism, Victory, Salvation, Peace, Aspiration, Memory
